meta.title: Lowell Area Schools

meta.content: Home page of the entire website

a.span: MI School Data Visit Our Dashboard

div.p: In our growing community and surrounding rural areas, Lowell Area Schools (LAS), located 18 miles east of Grand Rapids, offers educational opportunities where every student is guided and encouraged to reach his or her full potential. Learn more about Our District
